channel.title: Chess Summit on Franklin Chen
channel.description: Recent content in Chess Summit on Franklin Chen

item.title: The powerful e5 Pawn break against the Benoni: using it as White, neutralizing it as Black
item.description:
I’ve been very busy coaching chess and therefore haven’t published any chess writing lately, but I was inspired by a discussion about a chess position with Isaac, the creator of Chess Summit, to write a guest blog post there.

If you love chess and want to follow the journeys of chess players who are working hard to improve their game and share their stories along the way, check out the Chess Summit site!
